dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2254 IS: Click to Cancel Consumer Protection Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Gallego (for himself and Mr. Welch) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To codify the Federal Trade Commission's negative option rule.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Click to Cancel Consumer Protection Act of 2025.

section.header: Codifying the Federal Trade Commission's negative option rule
section.text: Part 425 of title 16, Code of Federal Regulations, as in effect on July 7, 2025, shall have the force and effect of law.
